Name: MYSTIC VR
About the game: MYSTIC VR is a puzzle adventure that finds you in a magical world which is trapped in eternal night. Find the clues and solve the puzzles to open the doors and activate the crystal spheres to bring back the dawn in this calming, family-friendly experience. Built from the ground-up for VR, this experience features teleportation locomotion and room scale with full motion-controller support.
